title: Gabrielle Union, Tracee Ellis Ross celebrate 47th birthdays, reveal secret to youth
text:
CLOSE Actress Gabrielle Union impersonates “lazy” paparazzi who can’t tell her apart from Ashanti. (July 11) AP

Gabrielle Union and Tracee Ellis Ross are 47 and feeling good!

The two actresses, who share a birthday Tuesday, spent their special day celebrating and giving their thoughts on aging.

When MEFeater Magazine tweeted photos of Union in a tight dress and swimsuit for her birthday, fans seemed struck with one question: How does the actress stay looking so young?

"Are you sure it's not 27th??" one user wrote.

"She's 47??!" wrote another. "Lies"

"HOW," another wrote.

Lucky for fans, Union revealed her "secret," in a tweet later that day.

"Secret you ask... water, tequila, boundaries & an extra helping of accountability," the actress wrote. "#47"

Secret you ask... water, tequila, boundaries & an extra helping of accountability 🖤💪🏾 #47 https://t.co/u9Xo04v32z — Gabrielle Union (@itsgabrielleu) October 29, 2019

Union also wished a "Happy Birthday" to her b-day twin Ross on Instagram, posting a photo of them together smiling at an event with Ross' brother Evan keeping a straight face in the background.

"Happy Birthday to my girl who always gets my jokes and always down for the antics!" Union wrote. "Clearly, here me and @traceeellisross are (laughing) and @realevanross does not see the humor on our shenanigans. Lmao Love you lady"

"@gabunion BIRTHDAY TWIN !!!!!! 47!!!" the "Black-ish" star wrote in the comments, adding, "I LOVE YOU WOMAN!!! The only person who can get me to turn UP!"

Ross posted the same photo on her Instagram to gush about Union in return.

"Happy Birthday the vibrant, gorgeous, hilarious @gabunion oh how I love being your birthday twin," she wrote. "This is 47 and it looks so good on you. You are the one person who can get me to turn up and thank goodness cause otherwise I am at home! Love you lady!"

Earlier in the day, Ross posted photos of herself relaxing in a bikini in honor of her special day.

"It’s my birthday. I’m 47 today and I’m filled with gratitude. I LOVE getting older and I LOVE my life," she wrote. "I’m so grateful to be living this life I’m in. I’ve worked so hard to feel good in my skin and to build a life that truly matches me and I’m in it and it feels good. I remain curious and teachable and so it will all keep getting better."

Ross added the photos have "no filter" or retouch.

"47 year old thirst trap!" she added. "Boom!"

description: Happy birthday, Gabrielle Union and Tracee Ellis Ross! Check out Union's secret to aging and Ross' "47 year old thirst trap" photos on Instagram.
